summary.para: Adds a reference to an optional app package or a payload file within an app bundle.

param.name: fileName
param.para: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of fileName.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: By adding a reference to a payload file or optional app package to an app bundle, the overall size of the bundle is reduced.

summary.para: Finalizes the bundle package by writing footprint files at the end of the package, and closes the writer’s output stream.

param.name: hashMethodString
param.para: The string value of the HashMethod attribute of the BlockMap root element.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for bundle packages.
